title: Project out of school: planning a quality service
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child care
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/School facilities - Extended use
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/School-age child care
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Child care
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child care
description: Provides the considerations for planning quality out of school programs both before and after school. Shows a number of active programs, emphasises the advantages of holding such programs, and illustrates ways of involving parents, children and staff. Appropriate for Professional Development and Personal Development (Home Economics) at VCE level
